name: Unreal Engine 4 Dark Documentation
description: Update 2018-12-22: Fixed the header, footer, and main content backgrounds. Various borders darkened. This style applies a dark grey-ish theme, similar to how the Unreal Engine 4 Editor itself looks. The contrast between the UE4 Editor and the documentation (which is bright white by default) was getting on my nerves, so I threw this together. It's not perfect, but it does make the documentation a lot easier on the eyes!
additional_info: Contributions and updates are welcome, as I mentioned, this isn't perfect, just something I threw together really quick to ease the stress on my eyes.
